content: **skill level ** basic **size ** one size **finished measurements ** width 9 pre blocking 9 blocked circumference 30 pre blocking 34 blocked **gauge ** 24 sts and 30 rnds = 4 in st st blocked to save time take time to check gauge **materials ** yarn citizen affinity sport weight 100% super fine alpaca 173yds/50g per ball 4 balls shown in color dune needles us size 4 3 5mm 16-inch circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch markers tapestry needle **pattern notes ** piece is worked in the round with circular needle when finished cast-on and bound-off edges are sewn together to create loop
